readingKunHtml: すべから, すべし, ひげ, まつ, もち, もと
sourceMeaningMnemonic: Shaving the <radical>hair</radical> off a <radical>geoduck</radical> before you try to eat it is absolutely <kanji>necessary</kanji>. If you don't, the hair will get caught in your throat and you'll choke. It is necessary that you remove the hair.
meaningInfo: Picture the page in your cookbook where it says "Shaving the hair off your geoduck = Necessary!!" It's absolutely necessary that you follow that instruction!
readingMnemonic: It is also <kanji>necessary</kanji> that you wear a <reading>su</reading>it (<ja>す</ja>) when eating shaved geoduck. It's a super fancy meal so a suit is necessary for you to enjoy it correctly.
readingInfo: What's necessary? To shave the hair off your geoduck and to wear a suit. That's not too hard. You should do it.
